Pages.Text:
Umm...
That's really insensitive, and *they* are Mr Mentoe's personal
workforce.

They're basically the umpalumpas like in Charlie in the chocolate
factory, however it's more like the idiot in Mr mentoes corp.
complex... doesn't exactly have the same ring to it.

I don't know...
They kinda look like evil gremlins to me, and I doubt those claws are
particularly useful in an office.
